creator: mail@rolf-kulemann.com
text:
One often uses a *page footer* in web projects containing last change date etc.
There should be a prepared aggregation and transformation for such a footer.
See url for a patch and details.
as a. kuckartz pointed out, these bugs need to stay on the radar. reopened
creator: gregor@apache.org

text:
again,

do you still have that patch and can append it here?
